userId.description: The user's email address. The special value `me` can be used to indicate the authenticated user.

id.description: The ID of the message to modify.

addLabelIds.description: A list of IDs of labels to add to this message. You can add up to 100 labels with each update.

removeLabelIds.description: A list IDs of labels to remove from this message. You can remove up to 100 labels with each update.
